import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { getProjects, postProject } from '../store/actions/projectActions' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import '../styles/allProjects.css' import ProjectForm from '../components/ProjectForm' import ProjectItem from '../components/ProjectItem' import Toggler from '../hooks/toggler' function AllProjects(props) { const { projects, errors, postProject, history } = props const [showForm, toggleShowForm] = Toggler(true) let projectsMap = projects.map((project, i) => ) return (

All Projects

}
) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { projects: state.projects, errors: state.errors, } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, { getProjects, postProject })(AllProjects)
